articles.title: Benfica to ‘restart from zero’ with Enzo Fernandez after Chelsea transfer saga
articles.description: Argentina star’s £112m move to Chelsea has stalled.
articles.content:
B enfica manager Roger Schmidt says the club are ready to “restart from zero” with Enzo Fernandez after Chelsea’s botched move to sign the midfielder.
The Lisbon giants are unhappy with the Blues’ pursuit of the 21-year-old, who helped Argentina win ... [772 chars]

articles.title: Lisandro Martinez exclusive interview: World Cup celebrations and why Marcus Rashford can be one of world's best
articles.description: Lisandro Martinez speaks to Sky Sports News about Marcus Rashfords potential to become one of the worlds best players, celebrating World Cup glory with Argentina, and consoling Man Utd team-mate Raphael Varane after the final whistle at Lusail Stadium
articles.content:
Lisandro Martinez has echoed the view of his Manchester United team-mate Casemiro by saying Marcus Rashford can become one of the world's best players.

articles.content:
France manager Didier Deschamps takes off his runner-up medal after his team's World Cup final defeat to Argentina. Photograph: Shutterstock

articles.title: FIH Odisha Hockey Men’s World Cup 2023 Bhubaneswar-Rourkela: Pool A Preview
articles.description: Argentina, Australia, France and South Africa will face off in Pool A at the FIH Odisha Hockey Men’s World Cup 2023
articles.content: The 16 best men’s teams from around the world are converging in Odisha, India as we countdown to the final few days till the start of the FIH Odisha Hockey Men’s World Cup 2023. Each team comes with the aim of becoming world champions, but only one t... [5058 chars]

articles.title: It pooped plastic: Rescued sea turtles return to ocean in Argentina after detox
articles.description: The green turtles are released after a month in animal rehab where scientists checked their swimming, helped with their diet, and gave them a chance to detox from plastics
articles.content: RELEASE. Personnel of Mundo Marino foundation release to the ocean two green sea turtles (Chelonia mydas), who were rescued after they became entangled in fishing nets, with one of the pair of endangered creatures excreting plastic ingested from the ... [1565 chars]
